dict.acceptation: 条，棒；（门、窗等的）闩；障碍；酒吧间；
闩（门等）；阻碍，封锁；排除，去除；

sent.orig: Two sets of Belleville springs maintain a minimum permanent packing stress of 4,000 psi (275 bar).
sent.trans: 两套盘型弹簧保持4，000psi(bar)最小的永久性包压应力。

sent.orig: The Bren is a mix of a support weapon such as a BAR and a machinegun.
sent.trans: 履带式小型装甲车是由一个BAR和一挺机枪组成的支援武器。

sent.orig: Allied BAR Suppression ability can no longer suppress and pin units in heavy cover.
sent.trans: 盟军的BAR自动步枪的压制射击技能将不能压制或钉死重掩护下的单位。

sent.orig: Said recently to watch a soccer match, there are several very popular restaurant and BAR.
sent.trans: 说是最近看球，有几家BAR和餐厅很有人气。

sent.orig: While bar-hopping you might a pool table and feel like a quick game or two.
sent.trans: 当bar-hopping时你可能会看到一张台球桌并想要快速玩上一两盘。
